Text: Tak abo Israe̩l chaka kʼo̩la-ma wʼugbo Defid He̩bro̩n, ma kakini, Go, awa kpʼuwe̩ chʼachiku kpʼo̩re̩laʼka.

Igbele i chaka chʼe̩gba ki So̩l chʼonu le̩, uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩ Israe̩l dufu, uwe̩ laño̩ ko ma dabi wa. Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, la ka ñw e̩ kakini, Uwe̩ achʼadejute̩ amone̩-mi, Israe̩l; uwe̩ la achʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi, Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ abogijo Israe̩l chaka lewa He̩bro̩n ugbo onu Taku Defid fʼalo che kpʼama He̩bro̩n eju Jihofa; oñ ma fʼekpo ba tu Defid oji kʼi jʼonu Israe̩l, alu ku Jihofa ka lʼalu Sumiue̩l le̩.
Taku Defid kpʼabo Israe̩l chaka nyi Je̩rusale̩m (owñ che Je̩bius); ugbo kʼabo Je̩bius ku ma dodo ane̩ le̩ la jo̩.
Tak abo ku ma dodo Je̩bius ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ ñʼagudu wʼejefu emi n. I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ Defid fʼaku Zayo̩n le̩ du; oñ e-le̩ gbage̩de̩ mud ewo Defid.
Taku Defid kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki fʼabo Je̩bius gwoda ejodudu, e̩ne̩ le̩ la achʼoji kpʼonu ogu. Oñ Joab, o̩ma Ze̩ruaya, mute̩gu le ejodudu; abe̩le̩ ma mʼowñ du chʼoji.
Taku Defid kwododo ef aku le̩; todule̩ oñ ma dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Ewo Defidi.
Oñ i fʼewo le̩ ne daka, akwo Milo gbogbo le daka; Joab la fʼugbo ki bo̩ ewo le̩ ñwo̩che.
Defid la nanana nyo̩gba waa; todu ku Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du dʼugbo-wñ.
Abo ku ma dʼoji dufu ef ame̩nugbiti ki Defid ne̩ la jo̩-i, owñ chʼabo ku ma manyʼu o̩la kpaka ojane̩-wñ le̩, manyʼabo Israe̩l chaka, ku ma dʼowñ jʼonu teju o̩la Israe̩l ku Jihofa ka.
Aluka amagbiti ku Defid ne̩ le̩ de̩: Jesho̩be̩am, e̩ne̩ Hakmo̩n oka, chʼoji abo ogue̩gwa le̩; owñ le̩ dʼo̩kwo̩-wñ kwane̩ akobʼone̩ oli me̩fa, oñ i ko ma kpa e̩re̩ kate.
E̩leaza, o̩ma Dodo, e̩ne̩ Ahoʼka ro̩nʼo̩, i dʼef amagbiti me̩ta le̩.
Owñ dʼugbo Defid Pas-damim, ugbo kʼabo Filistia kʼo̩la-ma wa jo̩ ku ma jogu ugbo kʼe̩bu ane̩ kʼo̩ka barli chʼe̩kʼef uwñ de̩; amone̩ le̩ la ra rʼo̩gba abo Filistia.
Tak ama dago jʼalumeji e̩bu ane̩ le̩, ma la mʼu gba te̩, oñ ma fʼabo Filistia gwoda; Jihofa la nʼujadu lile gba ma.
Tak one̩ me̩ta kwʼefabo ogue̩gwa ku ma dʼoji dufu le̩ gwo̩ru nyʼugbo Defid, ugbo okuta ef owo Adulam; abogu Filistia la ruru jo̩ ef o̩go̩ Re̩feim.
Defid la dʼef aku e̩gba le̩, oñ abide abo Filistia jo Be̩tle̩he̩m iko le̩.
Defid ñeju kakini, O, i ma nʼe̩ne̩ ki adʼomi obuga ki me̩ru alaku Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩ ñwu mi ñmo̩!
Tak abo me̩ta le̩ gwo̩ko̩ gu alumeji uru abo Filistia du, oñ ma fʼomiofo kpa kwef obuga kʼi dʼalaku Be̩tle̩he̩m le̩, taku ma ma mʼu du wa ñwu Defid; Defid muda ko̩ eñmʼo̩, i la du dajane̩ ñwu Jihofa.
Oñ i kakini, O̩jo̩ ki kpo̩na, kʼomi kʼu chʼe-i: omi añmo̩ e̩bie̩ abo ku ma mʼoji e-ma du tinyo̩-i? Todu oji-ma ma du tinyo̩ oñ ma ne̩ wa-i. Todule̩ i ko̩ eñmʼo̩. E̩wñ kʼamagbiti me̩ta le̩ che de̩.
Oñ Abishai, o̩maye Joab, chʼoji abo me̩ta; i dʼo̩kwo̩-wñ kwane̩ akobʼone̩ oli me̩fa oñ i fʼuma gwo dajane̩, i la fʼodu ne̩ ef ama me̩ta le̩.
Ef amame̩ta le̩ owñ nʼojima tʼabo meji ki bo̩ le, i laño̩ chʼagboji; o̩wo̩-wñ muda tʼo̩wo̩ abo me̩ta ejodudu le̩ le n.
Be̩naya o̩ma Jiho̩yada, o̩ma e̩nuwohiʼka kʼi de̩ Kabzee̩l, kʼi la fʼuko̩lo̩ ukpahiu wewe che; owñ chʼe̩ne̩ ki fʼamidu e-Moab meji kpa; i la gwo̩ru nyʼef uraʼka iko ku sno dʼane̩ oñ i fʼidu kpa o̩mo̩.

I ño̩ fʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti kpa, e̩ne̩ le̩ gba tabale, ohibo̩wo̩ me̩le̩; o̩kwo̩ ki dabu ugbolo oli kʼahiukpo ane̩ fʼukpo wenyʼu dʼo̩wo̩ e̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩; oñ i nʼo̩kpa agwo̩ru nyʼugbo-wñ, i la bʼe̩ne̩ Ijipti le̩ gbʼo̩kwo̩-wñ, oñ i nʼo̩kwo̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ gbage̩de̩ fʼu kpa.
Be̩naya, o̩ma Jiho̩yada, fʼe̩wñ le̩ che, oñ i nʼodu ef amagbiti me̩ta le̩.
Go, i nʼojima tʼabo ogue̩gwa le̩ le, o̩wo̩-wñ muda tu o̩wo̩ abo me̩ta le̩ n. Oñ Defid mʼowñ du chʼagboji abo ide-wñ.
Amagbiti abogu jo̩-i, Asahe̩l, o̩maye Joab; E̩lhenan o̩ma Dodo e-Be̩tle̩he̩m;
Shamot, e̩ne̩ Haroar; Hile̩z e̩ne̩ Pilo̩n;
Aira o̩ma Ike̩sh, e̩ne̩ Te̩koa; Abieze̩r, e̩ne̩ Anato̩t,
Sibe̩kai, e̩ne̩ Husha; Aile̩yai e̩ne̩ Ahoa;
Maharai, e̩ne̩ Ne̩tofa; Hile̩d o̩ma Beana, e̩ne̩ Ne̩tofa;
Aiteyei o̩ma Raibeai e-Gibea, e-amo̩ma Be̩njamin, Be̩naya, e̩ne̩ Paire̩to̩n;
Hureai, ki kwʼo̩la aji aji Geash; Abaie̩l, e̩ne̩ Arba le̩;
Azmefe̩t, e̩ne̩ Beharum; Ilayaba, e̩ne̩ Shealbo;
amo̩ma Hasham e̩ne̩ Gizo̩n; Jo̩natan, o̩ma Shagi, e̩ne̩ Harar;
Ahayam, o̩ma Sekar, e̩ne̩ Harar; Ilaifo̩l o̩ma Ur,
Hefe̩r, e̩ne̩ Me̩kiro̩t; Ahija, e̩ne̩ Pilo̩n;
He̩zro̩, e̩ne̩ Karme̩l; Nearai o̩ma E̩zbai;
Joe̩l o̩maye Netan; Mibhar o̩ma Hagirai,
Zile̩k, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n; Neharai, e̩ne̩ Birot, kʼi anʼane̩ ogu Joab o̩ma Ze̩ruaya le̩;
Aira, e̩ne̩ Itrai, Gare̩b, e̩ne̩ Itrai;
Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t; Zebad o̩ma Aleai;
Adina o̩ma Shiza, e̩ne̩ Rube̩n kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi dʼoji dufu ef abo Rube̩n kpʼone̩ ogue̩gwa manyʼuwñ;
Henan o̩ma Maaka kpai Joshafat, e̩ne̩ Mitnai;
Uzaya, e̩ne̩ Ashtirat; Shema kpai Jehaye̩l, amo̩ma Hotam, e̩ne̩ Aroe̩r le̩,
Je̩diee̩l o̩ma Shimrai kpai Joha o̩maye-wñ, e̩ne̩ Taiza le̩,
Ilaie̩l, e̩ne̩ Mahefa kpai Je̩re̩beai kpai Jo̩shafaya, amo̩ma E̩lneam kpai Itma, e̩ne̩ Moab,
Ilaie̩l kpai Obe̩d kpai Jasie̩l, e̩ne̩ Me̩zo̩be.
